nodes.text: 2767 was a B1-series battle droid in the Trade Federation Droid Army. In 32 BBY, he was part of the forces deployed to the city of Theed on the planet Naboo by the Federation during its invasion of the world. 2767 was part of a group of battle droids led by the OOM command battle droid 2163 that were tasked with guarding the Naboo Royal Starship in the Theed Hangar.

The droids were soon approached by a group led by the Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn, who was attempting to transport Queen Padmé Amidala off world using the royal starship. After 2163 ordered Jinn and his companions be arrested, the Jedi Obi-Wan Kenobi cut down 2767, allowing the Queen to escape.

2767 first appeared in the 1999 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace. In the film, 2767's designation is not spoken, but the numerals are visible on the droid's comlink booster pack, which translate to 2767.
